A deal would put their combined equity value at around $28 billion.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2016/08/31/business/dealbook/potash-corp-and-agrium-discuss-merger-deal.html", "snippet": "Shares at both Canadian companies jumped after they confirmed early negotiations. A deal would put their combined equity value at around $28 billion.", "lead_paragraph": "A potash giant may soon emerge from the ashes of failed global matchmaking. Canadian fertilizer producers Potash Corp. and Agrium say they are discussing a merger. {"abstract": "The straightforward, no-premium deal is a contrast to other recent attempts at industry mash-ups, which did not fare so well.", "web_url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2016/09/13/business/dealbook/potash-and-agrium-deal-is-a-friendly-balanced-merger.html", "snippet": "The straightforward, no-premium deal is a contrast to other recent attempts at industry mash-ups, which did not fare so well.", "lead_paragraph": "It is a rare corporate love-in. The Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan and Agrium, a fertilizer company, have agreed to a merger of equals worth $36 billion in enterprise value.
